txt.en:
'[placeholder], it is vital that these half-orcs do not bring their bounty to Saruman the White. There is no telling what mischief a Wizard might put the relics of the Elves to.

'Go to Pembar, my friend. Defeat the half-orcs and wrest from them any relics or trinkets you may find. They cannot be allowed to fulfil their task.

'Pembar lies to the north-east, if the direction eludes you.'
'Thank you, [placeholder], for bringing these things to me. The half-orcs uncovered many whole relics and trinkets which might have been put to ill use by Saruman.'
'Have you been unable to recover any relics and trinkets from the half-orcs at Pembar? Alas, that is ill news. Will you not try again, [placeholder]?'
Your examination of the rubble at Pembar yielded some relic-fragments, which concern Faenhilith greatly.

Elf-relics and Elf-trinkets are being held by the half-orcs who are encamped at Pembar, north-east of Echad Eregion.\n\nFaenhilith has asked you to go to Pembar and defeat the half-orcs there, bringing her any relics or trinkets you find in their possession.
